trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> property between two or more target values using a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> to specify those values.
trans-unit.target: 值进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>属性使用的两个或多个目标值之间<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>以指定这些值。

trans-unit.source: This animation can be used to move a visual object along a path.
trans-unit.target: 此动画可用于移动可视对象沿路径。

trans-unit.source: PointAnimationUsingPath uses linear interpolation over a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: PointAnimationUsingPath 在指定的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>上使用线性内插

trans-unit.source: PointAnimationUsingPath is particularly well suited for animating the position of an object on the screen if the object uses a <xref:System.Windows.Point> property to specify position.
trans-unit.target: PointAnimationUsingPath 是非常适用于对屏幕上的对象的位置进行动画处理，如果该对象使用<xref:System.Windows.Point>属性来指定位置。</xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: There is no default <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> so the user must specify one.
trans-unit.target: 没有默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>因此用户必须指定一个。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个值，表示正进行动画处理的属性的当前值所确定的那样<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的动画的属性的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的原始值，如果动画没有自己显式设置使用起始值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的目标使用的值，如果动画没有自己显式设置结束值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> that generates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> used by the animation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> ，用来生成<> *1> 或<> *1> 动画所使用。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.
trans-unit.target: 计算属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定是否将动画的输出值添加到正进行动画处理的属性的基值。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| > [!NOTE] > This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为**true**|None | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于，并由各种派生类共享。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果动画将其输出值添加到动画而不是替换它; 否则为属性的基值**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“false” 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定重复时是否累计该动画的值。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为**true**，该动画的输出时，值仅累计该动画的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不会不会累计其值，因为其父重复重新启动时，或因为其时钟已重新启动从<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于，并由各种派生类共享。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the animation accumulates its values when its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> property causes it to repeat its simple duration. otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果动画累计它的值时其<> *1> 属性后，即可重复其简单持续时间。 否则， * *false**。默认值是* *false**。

trans-unit.source: Called when this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref> is modified.
trans-unit.target: 时调用此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath"></xref>被修改。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the geometry used to generate this animation's output values.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于生成此动画输出值的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: For examples of creating a path using markup or code, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建使用标记或代码路径的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The path used to generate this animation's output values.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成此动画的路径的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath.PathGeometry*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath.PathGeometry*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingPath.PathGeometry*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
